name: Bhixen
content:
Bhixen was a senior male Togorian Jedi apprentice in training in the Jedi Academy on Shedu Maad soon after the Lost Tribe of Sith emergence.
In 45 ABY, he passed the Trials under the supervision of the Jedi Council in order to become the apprentice of Jedi Master Jaina Solo Fel. Unfortunately, the young Togorian, although promising, showed too much pride and aggressiveness, so instead of being paired with Solo, Bhixen was retrograded, with his consent, to the rank of Novice in order to learn humility.
